selected_quotes: Medium-Chain Fatty Acids Improve Cognitive Function in Intensively Treated Type 1 Diabetics
Trigliceridos de cadena media(aceite de coco) y función cognitiva. Wow!!
Medium chain FA support Cognitive Function in Intensively Treated Type 1 Diabetic Patients During Acute Hypoglycemia
Ácidos grasos de cadena media y Diabetes tipo 1
Medium-Chain Fatty Acids Improve Cognitive Function in Intensively Treated Type 1 Diabetic Patients and… #News

citation.abstract: We examined whether ingestion of medium-chain triglycerides could improve cognition during hypoglycemia in subjects with intensively treated type 1 diabetes and assessed potential underlying mechanisms by testing the effect of beta-hydroxybutyrate and octanoate on rat hippocampal synaptic transmission during exposure to low glucose.
citation.title: Medium-Chain Fatty Acids Improve Cognitive Function in Intensively Treated Type 1 Diabetic Patients and Support In Vitro Synaptic Transmission During Acute Hypoglycemia
